prompts: Create a Pokemon inspired by desserts, featuring a colorful and creamy appearance.
I want a sweet-looking character that has layers of frosting and berries.
Generate a fairy-type Pokemon that resembles a towering cake with vibrant colors.
Make a whimsical Pokemon with a soft, rounded shape and multiple colors across its body.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies sweetness and charm, ideal for a bakery-themed adventure.
Design a delightful Pokemon that combines the essence of celebration and joy.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a dessert masterpiece with colorful toppings.

distinctive_features: Decorative elements like berries and cream
